content.rendered:
We’re just full of new projects this spring at AVA!  Yesterday we launched a second website that is specific to our mountaintop zipline tours.

While we will continue to have information about ziplining on the AVA website, we wanted a place where we could showcase our tours more comprehensively and provide updates on the courses, hours of operation and more.  If you’re thinking about ziplining this spring or summer, check out the new site and read up on our two mountaintop zipline courses.

We have a mountaintop zipline course in Idaho Springs, just 30 minutes outside of Denver, that includes 6 different zips down the cliffs.  We also have a mountaintop zipline course in Buena Vista, overlooking the gorgeous Arkansas River Valley, that includes 7 different zips through the crags and treetops.

In addition to learning all about these courses, you’ll also be able to view photos and videos or even book online through the site.

We’re especially excited to be unveiling the new site today, because 12pm this afternoon we will kick off the 2013 mountaintop ziplining season with our first trip of the year!  That’s right – we’re zipping today!  We’ll be posting the new photos soon on coloradozipline.net.
